description: General Contractor Services required at Real Property Operations Unit West Garrison Wainwright, Alberta of Department of National Defence
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Notice Reference Number
WS4550840147

### Tender Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  is announcing a procurement opportunity using the Request for Standing Offer (RSO) method. This procurement seeks to establish a contract with a contractor to provide General Contractor Services to support the Real Property Operations Unit West Garrison Wainwright, located in Alberta, for the Department of National Defence.

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Title:** General Contractor Services – RPOU (W) Garrison Wainwright
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4550840147
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement

### Required Services

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing General Contractor Services, including but not limited to:

*   Facility maintenance and repair services

### Tendering Documents
Tender documents are available for download from the following link:
> https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19829124?extsite=MTk4MjkxMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Key Dates
*   **Publication Date:** May 27, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 21, 2024 14:00 MT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 30, 2024

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
*   Sabieh Ullah, PSPC/SPAC
*   Email: sabieh.ullah@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Note
Please note that this procurement has expired and is no longer accepting submissions.  The information provided is for reference only.

**Original information re-written into more cohesive and organized format. Key information has been preserved, but extraneous text has been excluded.  Changes were limited to adjustments in syntax, order, and phrasing to convey the message in a more documented manner, while respecting the original rule of 400 words.** 

### Legal Notice 
The original text and rewritten text are for educational purposes only. Please consult the official tender announcement for up-to-date and accurate information. All changes were made in accordance with grammatical correction to better present the message; including categorization, rephrasing and providing required contextual translation
